title: RIGHT (Function)
text:
FUNCTION RIGHT : STRING(255)
Returns a specific number of characters of a string, starting from right
RIGHT
(STR,
SIZE)
means: Return the first
SIZE
characters from the right in string
STR
(* Example declaration *)
VarSTRING1
:
STRING
;
(* Example in ST , result is 'USI' *)
VarSTRING1
:=
RIGHT
(
'SUSI'
,
3
);
